message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering its worth to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $12,000 is below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $13,250. This offer reflects its worth and allows us both to benefit.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $12,500 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't want to go any higher than that.
